generated_doNotEdit.title: Is Family
generated_doNotEdit.description: Returns true when the subject entity is a member of the named family.

choices.description: Test for less-than or equal to the value.
Test for greater-than or equal to the value.

fields.title: Subject
fields.description: (Optional) The subject of this filter test.

choices.title: Block
choices.description: The block involved with the interaction.

choices.title: Damager
choices.description: The damaging actor involved with the interaction.

choices.title: Other
choices.description: The other member of an interaction, not the caller.

choices.title: Player
choices.description: The player involved with the interaction.

choices.title: Self
choices.description: The entity or object calling the test

fields.title: Value
fields.description: (Required) The Family name to look for
